content: फलकं {@--1@} A board, plank, slab, tablet; कालः काल्या भुवनफलके क्रीडति प्राणिशारैः <ls>Bh. 3. 39</ls>; द्यूत°, चित्र° &c. {@--2@} Any flat surface; चुंब्यमानकपोलफलकां <ls>K. 218</ls>, धृतमुग्धगंडफलकैर्विबभुः <ls>Śi. 9. 47</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 9.">37</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> तट {@--3@} A shield. {@--4@} A slab, tablet, leaf or page for writing upon. {@--5@} The buttocks, hips. {@--6@} The palm of the hand. {@--7@} Fruit, result, consequence. {@--8@} Profit, gain. {@--9@} Menstruation. {@--10@} The head of an arrow. {@--11@} The pericarp of a lotus. {@--12@} A broad and flat bone (of the forehead).
